prompts:
Run a comprehensive CodeRabbit review on the Z.ai integration:

1. Run: coderabbit review --review-type uncommitted --output-mode plain
2. Wait for the review to complete (7-30 minutes)
3. Save full results to docs/CODERABBIT_ZAI_REVIEW.md
4. Create a summary document (docs/CODERABBIT_ZAI_SUMMARY.md) with:
   - Critical issues (must fix)
   - Important issues (should fix)
   - Minor issues (nice to have)
   - Security analysis
   - Performance analysis
   - Recommendations

Focus on the Z.ai integration files (zai_*.py) and any changes to agent_manager.py.

This review will help ensure the Z.ai integration is production-ready.

Run CodeRabbit review on the security patches that were just applied. Focus on:

1. `/Users/sem/mao-Z/__tests__/e2e/TEST_SUITE_SUMMARY.md` - Verify API key removed
2. `/Users/sem/mao-Z/docs/ZAI_CLIENT_WRAPPER_SUMMARY.md` - Verify API key removed  
3. `/Users/sem/mao-Z/apps/orchestrator_3_stream/backend/modules/agent_manager.py` - Verify config validation added

Run CodeRabbit on these specific files to confirm the critical security issues are resolved.

Save the review results to `/Users/sem/mao-Z/docs/CODERABBIT_SECURITY_PATCH_REVIEW.md`
